comment: So I didn t listen to the Throne Speech . Can someone tell me what provinces were mentioned by name so I can figure out my anger level on the Rage-A-Tron ? <URL>
amr:
# ::snt So I didn t listen to the Throne Speech . Can someone tell me what provinces were mentioned by name so I can figure out my anger level on the Rage-A-Tron ? <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / listen-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / speech
                  :mod (t / Throne)))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (t2 / tell-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / someone)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / province
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mention-01
                              :manner (n / name-01)))
                  :ARG2 (ii2 / i)
                  :purpose (f / figure-out-05
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (l2 / level
                              :mod (a2 / anger-01
                                    :ARG1 ii2)
                              :poss (p3 / product
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Rage-A-Tron")))
                        :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown)))))

comment: All the provinces were NOT named equally , apparently , so save your anger for UCP cuts .
amr:
# ::snt All the provinces were NOT named equally , apparently , so save your anger for UCP cuts .
(c / cause-01
      :ARG0 (n / name-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p / province
                  :mod (a / all))
            :ARG1-of (e / equal-01)
            :ARG1-of (a2 / appear-02))
      :ARG1 (s / save-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a3 / anger-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / cut-02
                        :ARG0 (p2 / political-party
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "UCP")))
                  :ARG1 y)))
